question: Which of the following is the correct order of evaluation for the below expression?z = x + y * z / 4 % 2 - 1
answer_description: C uses left associativity for evaluating expressions to break a tie between two operators having same precedence.

options.B: Print the contents of file "myfile.c" upto NULL character

answer_description: The program will generate infinite loop. When an EOF is encounteredfgetc()returns EOF. Instead of checking the condition for EOF we have checked it for NULL. so the program will generate infinite loop.
